TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Compiler extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider and System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler. The CSharpCodeProvider and CodeDom ICodeCompiler provide a much richer set of functionality for specifying how to launch the compiler.")

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已淘汰。**
C# 編譯器的受控包裝函式。

span.span: Managed wrapper for the C# compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要編譯 C\#程式碼同處理序，呼叫。To compile C\# code in-process, call .

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[] Compile (string[] sourceTexts, string[] sourceTextNames, string target, string[] imports, System.Collections.IDictionary options);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[] Compile(string[] sourceTexts, string[] sourceTextNames, string target, string[] imports, class System.Collections.IDictionary options) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compile (sourceTexts As String(), sourceTextNames As String(), target As String, imports As String(), options As IDictionary) As CompilerError()

public: static cli::array <Microsoft::CSharp::CompilerError ^> ^ Compile(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ sourceTexts, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ sourceTextNames, System::String ^ target, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ imports, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ options);
static member Compile : string[] * string[] * string * string[] * System.Collections.IDictionary -> Microsoft.CSharp.CompilerError[]

param.name: sourceTexts
param.span: 字串類型陣列，其中每個都具有 C\# 程式碼。

span.span: An array of type string, each with C\# code.

param.name: sourceTextNames
param.span: 字串類型陣列，包含每個 sourceTexts 的檔案名稱。

span.span: An array of type string that contains the file names for each sourceTexts.

param.name: imports
param.span: 字串類型陣列，其中包含要參考的檔案。

span.span: An array of type string, with files to reference.

summary.span: 將指定 C# 來源編譯到指定的目的地檔案。

span.span: Compiles the given C# sources to the specified destination file.

returns.span: 將診斷訊息作為 類型的陣列傳回。

span.span: Returns diagnostic messages as an array of type .

returns.span: 若陣列為空白或所有項目皆為警告，則編譯便會成功。

span.span: If the array is empty or all elements are warnings, the compilation succeeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SourceTexts 參數中的每個字串相當於單一原始程式檔。Each string in the sourceTexts parameter is the equivalent of a single source file. 必須有至少一個 sourceTexts 項目。There must be at least one sourceTexts element. SourceTextNames 參數中的檔案名稱會用於編譯器診斷和偵錯資訊。The file names in the sourceTextNames parameter are used for compiler diagnostics and debug information. 陣列是必要的但它可以在本機覆寫使用\#line 指示詞。The array is required, but it can be locally overridden by use of the \#line directive. 陣列必須有相同數目的元素做為 sourceTexts 參數。The array must have the same number of elements as the sourceTexts parameter. /Reference 編譯器選項相同的匯入參數。The imports parameter is the same as the /reference compiler option. 這個參數可以是 。This parameter can be . 選項參數中，金鑰是編譯器選項的簡短形式。For the options parameter, the key is the short form of the compiler option. 值為所需選項的值。The value is the value desired for the option. 選項參數可以是。The options parameter can be . 無法辨識某些編譯器選項。Some compiler options are not recognized. 可辨識的選項和值：Recognized options and value: | 索引鍵名稱Key Name | 使用量Usage | | --- | --- | | addmoduleaddmodule | 此組件中包含的模組清單。List of modules to include in this assembly. 模組名稱必須以分隔號或直立線符號字元分隔。The module names must be separated by the vertical bar or pipe character. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-addmodule (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1s46f83c)。See [-addmodule (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1s46f83c). | | baseaddressbaseaddress | 程式庫的基底位址。Base address for libraries. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-baseaddress (C#編譯器選項)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option.md)。See [-baseaddress (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/baseaddress-compiler-option.md). | | bugreportbugreport | 會產生錯誤報告檔案。Produces bug report file. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-bugreport (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/kaky3xy9)。See [-bugreport (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/kaky3xy9). | | checkedchecked | 若要檢查 （或取消核取），請設定預設運算式評估。Set default expression evaluation to checked (or unchecked). 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-檢查 (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/h25wtyxf)。See [-checked (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/h25wtyxf). | | dd | 以分號分隔清單來定義的符號。List of semicolon separated symbols to define. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-定義 (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0feaad6z)。See [-define (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0feaad6z). | | 偵錯debug | 發出偵錯輸出的資訊。Emit debug information with output. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 不能指定完整或僅限 pdb。Full or pdb-only cannot be specified. 請參閱[-偵錯 (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8cw0bt21)。See [-debug (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8cw0bt21). | | 文件doc | 將 XML 註解的檔案名稱。File name to put XML comments in. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-doc (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3260k4x7)。See [-doc (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3260k4x7). | | filealignfilealign | PE 區段對齊大小。PE section alignment size. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-filealign (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0s4tzdf2)。See [-filealign (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0s4tzdf2). | | incrincr | 啟用累加式重建。Enable incremental rebuild. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . | | liblib | 尋找模組和參考組件時所要搜尋的其他路徑。Additional paths to search when locating modules and referenced assemblies. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-lib (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/s5bac5fx)。See [-lib (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/s5bac5fx). | | linkreslinkres | 將受管理的資源連結至組件。Link a managed resource to the assembly. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-linkresource (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/xawyf94k)。See [-linkresource (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/xawyf94k). | | mm | 搜尋中的 Main 方法的型別。Type to search in for the Main method. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-主要 (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/x3eht538)。See [-main (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/x3eht538). | | nostdlibnostdlib | 執行不自動參考 mscorlib.dll。Do not auto-reference mscorlib.dll. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-nostdlib (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa13yay7)。See [-nostdlib (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa13yay7). | | nowarnnowarn | 以分號分隔清單不會報告警告編號。List of semicolon separated warning numbers to not report. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-nowarn (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f28x9z3)。See [-nowarn (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f28x9z3). | | oo | 啟用編譯器最佳化。Enable compiler optimizations. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-最佳化 (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/t0hfscdc)。See [-optimize (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/t0hfscdc). | | rr | 參考的組件。Referenced assemblies. 值必須是字串類型。Value must be of type String. 如果指定多個組件，則必須以分隔號或直立線符號字元分隔的檔案名稱。If more than one assembly is specified, the file name must be separated by the vertical bar or pipe character. 請參閱[-參考 (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/yabyz3h4)。See [-reference (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/yabyz3h4). | | resres | 內嵌 managed 的資源。Embed a managed resource. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-資源 (C#編譯器選項)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option.md)。See [-resource (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option.md). | | targettarget | 輸出檔案的目標類型，下列其中之一:"library"、"exe"、"winexe 」 或 「 模組 」。Output file target type, one of the following: "library", "exe", "winexe", or "module". 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-目標 (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6h25dztx)。See [-target (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6h25dztx). | | unsafeunsafe | 允許不安全的建構。Allow unsafe constructs. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-unsafe (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ct597kb0)。See [-unsafe (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ct597kb0). | | ww | 警告層級 (0-4)。Warning level (0-4). 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-warn (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13b90fz7)。See [-warn (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13b90fz7). | | warnaserrorwarnaserror | 報告為錯誤的警告診斷。Report warning diagnostics as errors. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-warnaserror (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/406xhdz3)。See [-warnaserror (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/406xhdz3). | | win32iconwin32icon | Win32 圖示的自動產生 Win32 資源。Win32 icon for auto generated Win32 resource. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-win32icon (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2aaxe43f)。See [-win32icon (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2aaxe43f). | | win32reswin32res | Win32 資源檔。Win32 resource file. 值必須是型別。Value must be of type . 請參閱[-win32res (C#編譯器選項)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f2f5x2e)。See [-win32res (C# Compiler Options)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8f2f5x2e). |

span.span: is not the same size as .
